name: The 7 deadly puzzles
description:
Hello,

Thank you for taking attention to this game. We are proud to give you our vision to the Arte Game Jam2020 theme : "Seven" with a 7 puzzles adventure.

What :

As you were deeply asleep and dreaming about hot sand on the beach and Nile crocodile, you feel a bite on your dead leg and found that a black beetle turns its branches at you.  It surely thought that you was good to eat.

How could it be possible ? You died a long time ago because as a Pharaoh you did not whipped enough your people.

Anyway, you are not dead (but mummified) that is a fact, and you really really wants to go out your tomb and prove this unconscious beetle that eating people is not allowed!

How to play :

- Like a strategy game/point and click, use your left click mouse to click on your environment and your mummy will follow.

- Use the left click to activate an object too.

- Space Bar is used to switch with your dead body.

Technical Specifications :

PC only

One player

No internet connection required
